title: PROPEL Liquidity Mining Pool 1
body:
The vote is on PROPEL allocation to create a Liquidity Mining Pool 1 under December 2020 month to reward traders that are actively trading on PayRue DEX.

Background
Any trader that is trading on PayRue DEX is eligible for PROPEL rewards. 

To be eligible for liquidity mining a trader needs to generate a minimum of 1,000 BUSD worth of liquidity in any listed token on PayRue DEX.

The Liquidity Mining Pool 1 is of 1,500,000 PROPEL for trading under December 2020.


Clarification and Example 
Bob trades 3,000 BUSD notional worth of tokens on PayRue DEX in one month. 

Example of total volume on PayRue DEX that month is 500,000 BUSD.

Bob’s proportional deal PayRue DEX trading in December is 3,000  / 500,000 = 0.006  

0.006 * 1,500,000 PROPEL (PROPEL Liquidity Mining Pool 1) = 9,000 PROPEL 

Bobs reward for trading on PayRue DEX that month is 9,000 PROPEL


Voting 

The vote is a YES or NO on creating a PROPEL Liquidity Mining Pool 1 to be tested under December 2020. With payout in January 2021.
author: 0xa9E81167b02cC4a79E100e3e0AF8f6Cd97Cc2727
